this afternoon, October 10,
Ho Chi Minh City Department of Health said that the city has
recorded more  such a patient with
monkeypox residing in Ho Chi Minh City.
Up to now, the city has
recorded 4 cases of monkeypox out of a
total of 5 cases in the whole country,
specifically on September 28, 2019.  2023 A
34-year-old male patient came to the
dermatology hospital with suspected monkeypox
and sent a test sample to the Pasteur Institute in
Ho Chi Minh City one day later.  The
patient is currently being
quarantined for treatment after being diagnosed with the virus. The
Ho Chi Minh City Center for Disease Control (HCDC) has conducted a
travel history investigation and compiled a list of people who had
close contact with the patient in the past.  Within 21 days
before recovering from the disease, according to epidemiological investigation, the
patient residing in Binh
Chanh district has not recorded any contact with
foreigners or recently traveled abroad.
The
contacts were in normal health before the illness.
Ho Chi Minh City Center for Disease Control continues to
investigate and monitor the health of patients
and contacts.

Ho Chi Minh City employment service center
said 9 months  At the beginning of 2023,
the unit received more than 127,000 applications for
unemployment benefits from
unemployed workers, an increase of 9% over the same period, an increase of
more than 10,000 people compared to the same period in
2022. In the
first 3 months of the year, the number of workers wanting to receive benefits
Unemployment benefits were just over 27,300
people, 6,000 lower than the same period. From April,
applications began to gradually increase, peaking in
August. The center received more than 17,000
cases for processing. This number in September was
over 11,300 for submission.  The first degree group is the group
without a degree or certificate, accounting for about
53% of the total number of applicants from
university or higher, accounting for 36%, ranked second and third.
Belonging to living with college accounts for nearly 6%
in the first 9 months of the year.  In 2023, the total number of
international visitors to Vietnam will reach about
8.9 million, exceeding the target of 8 million
international visitors for the whole year. In September, the
country welcomed 1.05 million international visitors, this
is the third consecutive month that the tourism industry
Our country's calendar welcomed over 1 million international visitors
in terms of market size. Korea
continues to be the largest tourist sending market
in victory over China,
ranked second. The Vietnam National Tourism Administration
expects to buy  At the end of the year
and taking advantage of opportunities from the
new visa exemption and electronic visa policy, the
number of international visitors to Vietnam
will continue to increase rapidly.

Turkey's Ministry of Internal Affairs has  confirmed that the explosion that
occurred near the National Assembly building on
October 1 was a
terrorist attack that
injured two policemen. Two terrorists arrived at the
scene in a car around  At
9:30 a.m. local time, or
about 1:30 p.m. Vietnam time, in front of the
entrance gate of the General Security Department of the Ministry of
Interior of Turkey and carried out a
bombing, the Ministry of Interior of Turkey confirmed

suicide bomb while the remaining suspect
was killed in a gun battle with
the police according to the Turkish parliament's plan for
October 1 after resuming operations
after this year's summer vacation,
ladies and gentlemen.  On Sunday, October 1,
Southeast Asia's first high-speed railway in Indonesia officially launched
commercial operations. The $7.3 billion project,
largely funded by China,
connects the capital Jakarta and  pondon a densely populated capital
of west-sava province
indonesian president choco qodo has
tested running on a
142.3 km long railway built by ptereta cebat
indonesia china a joint venture between an
indonesian alliance of 4 companies  The
Indonesian government and Chinase International
joint venture said the trains are now the
fastest in Southeast Asia with speeds of up to
350 kilometers per hour, travel time between
Singapore and Pando from the current 3 hours
to about 40 minutes under the project.  Originally
planned at a cost of $4.3 billion
but increased to $7.3 billion
the train was modified from the
original design to suit Indonesia's tropical climate
as well as being  Equipped with a
safety system to be able to respond to
earthquakes, floods or other natural disasters, the
train is 209m long and can accommodate about 601
passengers.

The Toner Award is the most
prestigious contemporary art award in the UK.  The
works of the artists nominated for
this year's terner awards are being
displayed in an exhibition at expoin town
ahead of the awards ceremony in december.
Interdisciplinary artist Jessie whose works
feature the use of metal rails
and rails followed by Gil Land Lyon
who reuses ventilation ducts and
everyday objects for his
third installation are these  Artistic works
in the media field include videos and
paintings by rori piuum, and finally
the works of barbara Walker.
This 59-year-old artist focuses on the
Vingroup generation when hundreds of thousands of people
moved from the Caribbean to England to  helped the
British government rebuild the country after World
War II. The Toner Prize was
established in 1984. The winner will
receive £25,000 in prize money. The three runners-
up will each receive £10,000. The
2023 winner will receive  was
revealed and on December 5,
a car museum known as a
paradise for movie lovers was recently
established in the ejc commune in northern
France, where many new car models
appear in movies.  The blockbuster was on
display so visitors could
rent it for a test run.
This museum is built in a
large hangar owned by
car collector Frank Galicer. Currently
Mr. Galiger owns 43 cars
in  There are originals of some live cars that
have been used in
famous Hollywood movies. In some
movies, the producers will create many
versions of the cars to
serve the scenes of Watching being destroyed.  And I was
lucky to be able to contact him to buy one
of those versions. For the others,
I had to go find the parts myself to
recreate it. Mr. Galiger said he didn't want
his museum to just be a place for visitors to
stand.  Looking at the samples, he wanted to
bring a more exciting and meaningful atmosphere,
so he added a test
drive rental service for some car models, thereby
satisfying the dreams of many action movie fans at the
museum.  is attracting
many domestic tourists by owning
many cars from movies such as
Batman and Fury Us. The museum
plans to welcome three new cars, including
one from the ever-famous Robocard movie.
Now in our imagination, the
musical is being
performed in Washington DC in the United States and
as the name suggests, it
surprises the audience when they learn that guns
with bullets become musical instruments and even
cook.  They flow to condemn
gun violence in America.
The weapons transform before the audience's eyes.
In the first act, they are affected by the sparks of
the iron door, then the fire of
the lanterns, and finally the ending.
fate in the furnace in the third and
final act of the Opera the music
is made from metal objects
Gongs And even the bells are made from
guns but the guns cause
a lot of destruction  destruction and pain
around the world and in this country are
now being turned into something
beautiful with a performance that sends a message condemning
gun violence. Especially after the
2016 Orlando nightclub shooting.  49 people
died, even metal
is not a constant in history. Guns and
cannons have been turned into
church bells in times of peace.
Artists also hope that their performance will be
enough to inspire many changes.

Ho Chi Minh City has temporarily detained the subject
Nguyen Thi Ngoc Dung, 39 years old, residing in District 12
to investigate the act of murder and
robbery. The victim is Ms. T, 26 years old, residing in
Long An province. A vegetable seller at
Thu Duc wholesale market.  Dung was a
previous buyer. At about 11:40 a.m.
yesterday, Ms. Huynh Thi Thuy Trang and the
suspect drove each other to the market's container truck yard
to talk about debt. When
Ms. Trang turned her back to leave, Dung was surprised.  He
grabbed her by the neck, knocked her down, then used a weapon to
stab the victim's face and neck dozens of times.
Dung then took the victim
's phone and some other property
while stopping at a red light at Bucket, showing signs of having
been drinking.  alcohol, so he was also asked to
test and the result was
0.302 mg/liter of breath. Besides, Mr.  In
this case, you will be fined from 4 million VND to
5 million VND, and you will be allowed to drive from
16 months to 18 months and your car will be impounded for 7
days from 4:00 a.m. to work at the
green goods traffic police station.
Minutes of sanctioning eight cases of alcohol violation

20 cases include two cars

authorities also recorded 8 cars
and 31 motorbikes in the case.  There were 37 cases of

locality.  Tay Ninh province desk,
Dak Lak province police said last night the
fire prevention and rescue force
promptly rescued a
2-year-old child trapped on the 16th floor of an
apartment building in the province.
The authorities received
news that a 2-year-old child was
trapped in apartment number 8 on the 16th floor of the
Hoang Anh Gia Lai apartment building. At
that time, only he left the child in the apartment. The door
was locked inside the child.  The baby was crying
loudly in panic and there were
many electrical appliances and sharp objects in the house. They
determined that breaking the lock would take
a long time. The police force swung a
rope from an apartment on the 18th floor to the
16th floor.  After about 5 minutes of
successfully rescuing the baby,
Thanh Tri district police today
